cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.DS, cs.OH, cs.SY 

This paper is about optimization theory and algorithms, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper specifically focuses on stochastic gradient methods, which are commonly used in machine learning for optimization. The paper also discusses adaptivity, which is a topic that falls under numerical analysis (cs.NA). The use of finite-sum and stochastic optimization also suggests that this paper could fall under the category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also discusses convergence rates, which is a topic that falls under optimization and operations research (cs.OH). Finally, the paper proposes a new algorithm, which could fall under the category of systems and control (cs.SY).
